text: Italian Campaign can mean the following: *The Italian campaign of 1524-1525 fought during the Italian War of 1521. *The Italian Campaign fought by Napoleon Bonaparte between 1796 and 1797. *The Austro-Sardinian War fought by Napoleon III of France and Kingdom of Sardinia against Austria in 1859. *The Italian Campaign (World War I) was fought primarily by Italy against Austria- Hungary in World War I. *The Italian Campaign (World War II) that began after the Allied invasion of Italy in World War II.
title: Italian Campaign
